author: Editor4
title: How lions left to die were rescued from war-torn Sudan - World News
text: A group of lions rescued from war-torn Sudan have found a new home in South Africa. The pride spent the best part of a year trapped in the heart of the conflict and are now being cared for at a specialist sanctuary. Many died before being evacuated. A warning this report from Sky‚Äôs Africa Correspondent Yousra Elbagir contains pictures of animals in distress.
